title.en: Merched y Wawr Aberystwyth 'Ruby Revelry' Sketch
title.cy: Sgets ‘Rhialtwch y Rhuddem’ gan Ferched y Wawr Aberystwyth

description.en:
Sgets ‘Rhialtwch y Rhuddem’ gan Ferched y Wawr Aberystwyth yng Nghystadleuaeth Gŵyl Haf, Mai 2007.
Rhes gefn – Mair Jenkins, Mairwen Williams, Delyth Fletcher, Eleri Davies, Beryl Jones, Mary C Jones, Rona Davies, Eluned Richards
Rhes flaen – Bethan Bryn, Elenid Hughes, Lona Jones, Dulcie James, Eira Williams, Beryl Llewellyn, Delyth Evans
